India.notes: Major domestic base. 80–85% of ISB/IIM cohorts are India-based professionals.

North_America.notes: Strong NRI representation; top MNCs and startups feed global applicants.

Europe.notes: Expats and European professionals, primarily consulting and finance backgrounds.

Middle_East.notes: 2–4% of cohort; project managers, oil & gas engineers, bankers, consultants.

Asia_Pacific.notes: Regional MNC professionals and NRI applicants in finance and product roles.

Africa.notes: Senior managers, consultants, and entrepreneurs in energy, mining, trade.

Latin_America.notes: Rare but growing pool from global MNCs and exchange students.

notes: Defines region distribution for ISB/IIM cohorts. Used for diversity sampling and currency mapping.
